contest-event.event-date:
July 3, 2016 D Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest
Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
brighouse-march-hymn-tune
March & Hymn Contest (Separate Points)
Brighouse, West Yorkshire Best march - Wingates. Best hymn - Wingates. Best principal cornet - Geraint Jones (Northop). Best euphonium - Chris Robertson (Wingates). Best soprano - Ashton-under-Lyne. Best basses - Hammonds Saltaire. Best trombones - Wingates. Best soloist - Melanie McFarland (Tenor horn) Wingates. Best road march - Ashton-under-Lyne. Deportment - Ashton-under-Lyne. Best section 1 band - Elland Silver. Best section 2 band - Flixton. Best section 4 band - Gawthorpe 85. Best unregistered - Thurlstone. Best section 4 hymn tune - Gawthorpe 85. Best youth - Elland Youth. Youth deportment - Tewit Youth. Youngest player - Claudia Bowen (Thurlstone)
July 6, 2016, 11:59 a.m. July 9, 2016, 8:17 p.m.
1 Wingates Band Paul Andrews March: The Wizard
2 Hammonds Saltaire Morgan Griffiths March: Honest Toil
3 Hepworth Band Mark Peacock March: Ravenswood
